children.value: set -xe     && sudo nginx     && sudo chown -hR mediagoblin:www-data /var/lib/mediagoblin     && {         bin/gmg dbupdate;         bin/gmg adduser --username "${MG_USER}" --password "${MG_PASS}" --email "${MG_MAIL}";         bin/gmg makeadmin "${MG_USER}";        }     && ./lazyserver.sh --server-name=fcgi fcgi_host=127.0.0.1 fcgi_port=26543
*/30 * * * * cd /root/.urlwatch && urlwatch --urls urls.yaml --config urlwatch.yaml --hooks hooks.py --cache cache.db
set -xe     && mkdir -p /var/run/zm     && chown www-data:www-data /var/run/zm     && /etc/init.d/fcgiwrap start     && /etc/init.d/php5-fpm start     && nginx -g 'daemon off;'
set -xe     && rm -f /var/run/dbus.pid     && dbus-daemon --system     && sleep 1     && avahi-daemon -D     && sleep 1     && shairplay --apname="$APNAME"
set -xe     && iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE     && pptpd     && syslogd -n -O /dev/stdout

set -xe     && curl -sSL https://core.telegram.org/getProxySecret > proxy-secret     && curl -sSL https://core.telegram.org/getProxyConfig > proxy-multi.conf     && mtproto-proxy --allow-skip-dh                      --user root                      --address 0.0.0.0                      --port 8888                      --http-ports 443                      --slaves $MTP_SLAVES                      --mtproto-secret $MTP_SECRET                      --aes-pwd proxy-secret                      proxy-multi.conf
set -xe     && rm -f /var/run/dbus.pid     && dbus-daemon --system     && rm -f /var/run/avahi-daemon/pid     && avahi-daemon -D     && homebridge

curl         g++         gnutls-dev         gpgme         libev-dev         libnl3-dev         libseccomp-dev         linux-headers         linux-pam-dev         lz4-dev         make         readline-dev         tar         xz

iptables -F     && iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -m state --state NEW --dport $LIMIT_PORT -m connlimit --connlimit-above $LIMIT_CONN -j DROP     && iptables -A OUTPUT -p tcp -m state --state NEW -m multiport ! --dports $TCP_PORTS -j DROP     && iptables -A OUTPUT -p udp -m state --state NEW -m multiport ! --dports $UDP_PORTS -j DROP     && tc qdisc add dev $DEVICE root tbf rate $RATE burst $BURST latency $LATENCY     && watch -n $INTERVAL tc -s qdisc ls dev $DEVICE
iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -o eth0 -j MASQUERADE     && ipsec _stackmanager start     && ipsec pluto     && xl2tpd -D
set -xe     && rm -f "${PLEX_MEDIA_SERVER_APPLICATION_SUPPORT_DIR}/Plex Media Server/plexmediaserver.pid"     && "/usr/lib/plexmediaserver/Plex Media Server"
autoconf build-base curl libtool linux-headers openssl-dev
